articles.description: England's World Cup is over, and their tournament has been a mess from the very start, with numerous issues affecting their title defence.
articles.title: 'A mess from the start - now England's World Cup is over'

articles.description: Liverpool enjoy the "perfect night" as they hit five past Toulouse and shake off one of the misses of the season in the Europa League.
articles.title: 'Liverpool must win Europa League' - Reds enjoy 'perfect' night

articles.description: Brighton claim a historic first win in European football against Ajax to keep alive their hopes of reaching the Europa League knockout stages.
articles.title: Brighton beat Ajax for historic first win in Europe

articles.description: Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton says more cars should be checked after races following his disqualification from the United States Grand Prix.
articles.title: More cars should be checked after races - Hamilton

articles.description: South Africa captain Siya Kolisi says a game of the magnitude of Saturday's Rugby World Cup final will not been seen again in "our lifetime".
articles.title: World Cup final biggest of 'our lifetime' - Kolisi

articles.description: BBC Sport profiles Chelsea and Australia forward Sam Kerr, one of five nominees for the BBC Women's Footballer of the Year 2023 award.
articles.title: Is Kerr your Women's Footballer of the Year?

articles.description: England's World Cup future is out of their hands after they lose by eight wickets to Sri Lanka in Bangalore at the Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: Dismal England slump to crushing Sri Lanka defeat

articles.description: Rangers emerge with a precious Europa League point from Prague after a testing night against Sparta.
articles.title: Rangers hold on for point against Sparta Prague

articles.description: Tyson Fury vows to knock Francis Ngannou "spark out" during a chaotic media conference which is overshadowed by the antics of the Briton's father.
articles.title: Fury vows to knock Ngannou 'spark out'

articles.description: Aston Villa ooze class as they cruise to a comfortable victory against AZ Alkmaar in the Europa Conference League.
articles.title: Villa cruise to Conference League win at AZ Alkmaar
